common.quota_update_required: Please update the CPA version or check for updates
common.custom_headers_hint: Optional HTTP headers to send with the request. Leave blank to remove.

auto_login.title: Auto Login in Progress...
auto_login.message: Attempting to connect to server using locally saved connection information

login.subtitle: Please enter connection information to access the management interface
login.connection_auto_hint: The system will automatically use the current URL for connection
login.custom_connection_hint: By default the current URL is used. Override it here if needed.
login.error_required: Please fill in complete connection information
login.error_invalid: Connection failed, please check address and key
login.error_network: Network connection failed, please check your network or server address
login.error_timeout: Connection timed out, server not responding
login.error_not_found: Server address invalid or management API not enabled
login.error_server: Internal server error, please try again later
login.error_cors: Cross-origin request blocked, please check server configuration

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Welcome to CLI Proxy API Management Center

basic_settings.title: Basic Settings
basic_settings.logs_max_total_size_hint: Set to 0 to disable the limit.
basic_settings.request_log_warning: Keep this off unless you need detailed troubleshooting.
basic_settings.routing_strategy_hint: round-robin cycles through keys; fill-first prioritizes the first available key.

api_keys.title: API Keys Management
api_keys.empty_desc: Click the button above to add the first key
api_keys.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this API key?

ai_providers.title: AI Providers Configuration
ai_providers.gemini_empty_desc: Click the button above to add the first key
ai_providers.gemini_add_modal_key_hint: Add keys one by one and optionally specify a Base URL.
ai_providers.gemini_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Gemini key?
ai_providers.excluded_models_placeholder: Comma or newline separated, e.g. gemini-1.5-pro, gemini-1.5-flash
ai_providers.excluded_models_hint: Leave empty to allow all models; values are trimmed and deduplicated automatically.
ai_providers.prefix_hint: When set, call models as prefix/<model> to target this entry.
ai_providers.codex_empty_desc: Click the button above to add the first configuration
ai_providers.codex_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Codex configuration?
ai_providers.claude_empty_desc: Click the button above to add the first configuration
ai_providers.claude_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Claude configuration?
ai_providers.claude_models_hint: Leave empty to allow all models, or add name[, alias] entries to limit/alias them.
ai_providers.vertex_empty_desc: Click the button above to add the first configuration
ai_providers.vertex_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this Vertex configuration?
ai_providers.vertex_models_hint: Each alias needs both the original model and the alias.
ai_providers.ampcode_upstream_url_hint: Optional. Leave empty to use the default/auto-discovered control plane URL.
ai_providers.ampcode_upstream_api_key_placeholder: Enter sk-amp... (leave empty to keep current)
ai_providers.ampcode_upstream_api_key_hint: Optional. Leaving it empty will not change the current Amp official key. Use the button below to clear it.
ai_providers.ampcode_clear_upstream_api_key_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear the Ampcode upstream API key (Amp official)?
ai_providers.ampcode_force_model_mappings_hint: When enabled, mappings override local API-key availability checks.
ai_providers.ampcode_model_mappings_hint: Rewrites model names in Amp requests. Leave empty to disable mappings.
ai_providers.ampcode_mappings_overwrite_confirm: Existing mappings could not be loaded. Continuing may overwrite or clear them. Continue?
ai_providers.openai_empty_desc: Click the button above to add the first provider
ai_providers.openai_keys_hint: Add each key separately with an optional proxy URL to keep things organized.
ai_providers.openai_add_modal_models_label: Model List (name[, alias] one per line):
ai_providers.openai_models_fetch_hint: Call the /models endpoint using the Base URL above, sending the first API key as Bearer plus custom headers.
ai_providers.openai_models_fetch_empty: No models returned. Please check the endpoint or auth.
ai_providers.openai_models_search_placeholder: Filter by name, alias, or description
ai_providers.openai_models_search_empty: No models match your search. Try a different keyword.
ai_providers.openai_models_fetch_invalid_url: Please enter a valid Base URL first
ai_providers.openai_edit_modal_models_label: Model List (name[, alias] one per line):
ai_providers.openai_delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this OpenAI provider?
ai_providers.openai_test_hint: Send a /chat/completions request with the current settings to verify availability.
ai_providers.openai_test_timeout: Test request timed out after {{seconds}} seconds.
ai_providers.openai_test_select_empty: No models configured. Add models first
ai_providers.openai_test_all_hint: Test connection status for all keys

auth_files.title: Auth Files Management
auth_files.description: Manage all CLI Proxy JSON auth files here (e.g. Qwen, Gemini, Vertex). Uploading a credential immediately enables the corresponding AI integration.
auth_files.empty_desc: Click the button above to upload the first file
auth_files.search_empty_desc: Try changing the filters or clearing the search box.
auth_files.delete_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete file
auth_files.delete_all_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all auth files? This operation cannot be undone!
auth_files.delete_filtered_confirm: Are you sure you want to delete all {{type}} auth files? This operation cannot be undone!
auth_files.delete_filtered_partial: {{type}} auth files deletion finished: {{success}} succeeded, {{failed}} failed
auth_files.delete_filtered_none: No deletable auth files under the current filter ({{type}})
auth_files.search_placeholder: Filter by name, type, or provider
auth_files.too_many_files_warning: Too many credentials. Showing all may cause performance issues, please use paged view.
auth_files.models_empty: No available models for this credential
auth_files.models_empty_desc: This credential may not be loaded by the server yet, or no models are bound to it.
auth_files.models_unsupported: This feature is not supported in the current version
auth_files.models_unsupported_desc: Please update CLI Proxy API to the latest version and try again
auth_files.priority_hint: Integers only. Invalid values are ignored. Larger value means higher priority.
auth_files.excluded_models_placeholder: Comma or newline separated, e.g. model-a, gpt-5-*, *-preview
auth_files.excluded_models_hint: Saved as an array and normalized by trim/lowercase/dedup/sort.
auth_files.disable_cooling_hint: Supports booleans, numeric 0/non-0, and strings like true/false/1/0; unparseable values are ignored.
auth_files.prefix_proxy_invalid_json: This auth file is not a JSON object, so fields cannot be edited.

antigravity_quota.title: Antigravity Quota
antigravity_quota.empty_desc: Upload an Antigravity credential to view remaining quota.

claude_quota.title: Claude Quota
claude_quota.empty_desc: Log in with Claude OAuth to view quota.

codex_quota.title: Codex Quota
codex_quota.empty_desc: Upload a Codex credential to view quota.
codex_quota.missing_account_id: Codex credential missing ChatGPT account ID
codex_quota.no_access: This credential has no Codex access (plan: free).

gemini_cli_quota.title: Gemini CLI Quota
gemini_cli_quota.empty_desc: Upload a Gemini CLI credential to view remaining quota.
gemini_cli_quota.missing_project_id: Gemini CLI credential missing project ID

vertex_import.title: Vertex JSON Login
vertex_import.description: Upload a Google service account JSON to store it as auth-dir/vertex-<project>.json using the same rules as the CLI vertex-import helper.
vertex_import.location_hint: Leave empty to use the default region us-central1.
vertex_import.file_hint: Only Google Cloud service account key JSON files are accepted.

oauth_excluded.title: OAuth Model Disablement
oauth_excluded.description: Per-provider model disablement is shown as cards; click a card to edit or delete. Wildcards * are supported and the scope follows the auth file filter.
oauth_excluded.provider_hint: Defaults to the current filter; pick an existing provider or type a new name.
oauth_excluded.models_unsupported: Current CPA version does not support fetching model lists.
oauth_excluded.models_loaded: {{count}} models loaded. Check the models to disable.
oauth_excluded.no_models_available: No models available for this provider.
oauth_excluded.list_empty_all: No provider model disablement yet; click “Add Disablement” to create one.
oauth_excluded.list_empty_filtered: No disabled items in this scope; click “Add Disablement” to add.
oauth_excluded.disconnected: Connect to the server to view model disablement
oauth_excluded.upgrade_required: Current CPA version does not support OAuth model disablement. Please upgrade.
oauth_excluded.upgrade_required_desc: The current server version does not support fetching OAuth model disablement. Please upgrade to the latest CPA (CLI Proxy API) version and try again.

oauth_model_alias.title: OAuth Model Aliases
oauth_model_alias.provider_hint: Defaults to the current filter; pick an existing provider or type a new name.
oauth_model_alias.model_source_unsupported: The current CPA version does not support fetching model lists (manual input still works).
oauth_model_alias.model_source_loaded: {{count}} models loaded. Use the dropdown in 'Source model name', or type custom values. Saving an empty list removes that provider. Enable 'Keep original' to keep the original name while adding the alias.
oauth_model_alias.delete_alias_confirm: Delete alias {{alias}} and unmap all associated models?
oauth_model_alias.list_empty_all: No model aliases yet—use “Add Alias” to create one.
oauth_model_alias.diagram_settings_empty: No mappings for this alias yet.
oauth_model_alias.diagram_tap_hint: On touch devices: tap a source model, then tap an alias to link.
oauth_model_alias.upgrade_required: This feature requires a newer CLI Proxy API (CPA) version. Please upgrade.
oauth_model_alias.upgrade_required_desc: The current server does not support the OAuth model aliases API. Please upgrade to the latest CLI Proxy API (CPA) version.

auth_login.codex_oauth_hint: Login to Codex service through OAuth flow, automatically obtain and save authentication files.
auth_login.anthropic_oauth_hint: Login to Anthropic (Claude) service through OAuth flow, automatically obtain and save authentication files.
auth_login.antigravity_oauth_hint: Login to Antigravity service (Google account) through OAuth flow, automatically obtain and save authentication files.
auth_login.gemini_cli_oauth_hint: Login to Google Gemini CLI service through OAuth flow, automatically obtain and save authentication files.
auth_login.gemini_cli_project_id_placeholder: Leave blank to auto-select first available project
auth_login.gemini_cli_project_id_hint: Optional. If not provided, the system will automatically select the first available project from your account.
auth_login.gemini_cli_project_id_required: Please enter a Google Cloud project ID.
auth_login.gemini_cli_oauth_start_error: Failed to start Gemini CLI OAuth:
auth_login.kimi_oauth_hint: Login to Kimi service through OAuth device flow, automatically obtain and save authentication files.
auth_login.qwen_oauth_hint: Login to Qwen service through device authorization flow, automatically obtain and save authentication files.
auth_login.oauth_callback_hint: Remote browser mode: after the provider redirects to http://localhost:..., copy the full URL and submit it here.
auth_login.oauth_callback_required: Please paste the full redirect URL first.
auth_login.oauth_callback_success: Callback URL submitted. Continue waiting for authentication.
auth_login.oauth_callback_upgrade_hint: Please update CLI Proxy API or check the connection.
auth_login.oauth_callback_status_success: Callback URL submitted, waiting for authentication...
auth_login.missing_state: Unable to retrieve authentication state parameter
auth_login.iflow_oauth_hint: Login to iFlow service through OAuth flow, automatically obtain and save authentication files.
auth_login.iflow_cookie_placeholder: Enter the BXAuth value, starting with BXAuth=
auth_login.iflow_cookie_hint: Submit an existing cookie to finish login without opening the authorization link; the credential file will be saved automatically.
auth_login.iflow_cookie_key_hint: Note: Create a key on the platform first.
auth_login.iflow_cookie_status_success: Cookie login succeeded and credentials are saved.
auth_login.iflow_cookie_config_duplicate: A config file already exists (duplicate). Remove the existing file and try again if you want to re-save it.
auth_login.iflow_cookie_required: Please provide the Cookie value first.
auth_login.remote_access_disabled: This login method is not available for remote access. Please access from localhost.

usage_stats.title: Usage Statistics
usage_stats.import_success: Import complete: added {{added}}, skipped {{skipped}}, total {{total}}, failed {{failed}}
usage_stats.chart_line_hint: Show up to 9 model lines at once
usage_stats.model_price_model_required: Please choose a model to set pricing
usage_stats.cost_need_price: Set a model price to view cost stats
usage_stats.cost_need_usage: No usage data available to calculate cost

logs.title: Logs Viewer
logs.error_logs_description: Pick an error request log file to download (only generated when request logging is off).
logs.error_logs_request_log_enabled: Request logging is enabled, so this list will always be empty. Disable request logging and refresh to view error logs.
logs.error_logs_empty: No error request log files found
logs.error_logs_load_error: Failed to load error log list
logs.empty_desc: When "Enable logging to file" is enabled, logs will be displayed here
logs.clear_confirm: Are you sure you want to clear all logs? This action cannot be undone!
logs.show_raw_logs_hint: Show original log text for easier multi-line copy
logs.search_placeholder: Search logs by content or keyword
logs.search_empty_desc: Try a different keyword or clear the filters.
logs.double_click_copy_hint: Double-click to copy raw log line
logs.upgrade_required_desc: The current server version does not support the logs viewing feature. Please upgrade to the latest version of CLI Proxy API to use this feature.

config_management.title: Config Panel
config_management.description: Edit config.yaml via visual editor or source file
config_management.status_disconnected: Connect to the server to load the configuration
config_management.error_yaml_not_supported: Server did not return YAML. Verify the /config.yaml endpoint is available.

remote.title: Remote Management
remote.description: Remote access and control panel settings
remote.allow_remote_desc: Allow management access from other hosts
remote.disable_panel_desc: Disable the built-in web control panel

auth.title: Authentication Configuration
auth.description: API keys and authentication directory settings

system.title: System Configuration
system.description: Debug, logging, statistics, and performance settings
system.commercial_mode_desc: Disable high-overhead middleware to support high concurrency

network.title: Network Configuration
network.force_model_prefix_desc: Unprefixed model requests only use credentials without prefix

quota.title: Quota Fallback
quota.description: Fallback strategy when quota is exceeded
quota.switch_project_desc: Automatically switch to another project when quota is exceeded
quota.switch_preview_model_desc: Switch to preview model version when quota is exceeded

streaming.title: Streaming Configuration
streaming.keepalive_hint: Set to 0 or leave empty to disable keepalive
streaming.bootstrap_hint: Number of retries during stream startup (before first byte)
streaming.nonstream_keepalive_hint: Send blank lines every N seconds for non-streaming responses to prevent idle timeout, set to 0 or leave empty to disable

payload.title: Payload Configuration
payload.description: Default values, override rules, and filter rules
payload.default_rules_desc: Use these default values when parameters are not specified in the request
payload.override_rules_desc: Force override parameter values in the request
payload.filter_rules_desc: Pre-filter upstream request body via JSON Path, automatically remove non-compliant/redundant parameters (Request Sanitization)

api_keys.label: API Keys List (api-keys)
api_keys.hint: Each entry represents an API key (consistent with 'API Key Management' page style)
api_keys.input_hint: This only modifies the local config file content, it will not sync to the API Key Management interface

quota_management.title: Quota Management
quota_management.description: Monitor OAuth quota status for Antigravity, Codex, and Gemini CLI credentials.

system_info.title: Management Center Info
system_info.models_desc: Shows the /models response and uses saved API keys for auth automatically.
system_info.version_check_desc: Call the /latest-version endpoint to compare with the server version and see if an update is available.
system_info.version_is_latest: You are on the latest version
system_info.version_current_missing: Server version is unavailable; cannot compare
system_info.quick_links_desc: Access project repositories and documentation for help and updates.
system_info.link_main_repo_desc: CLI Proxy API core program source code
system_info.clear_login_desc: Clear locally saved login data and sign out. Usage stats pricing settings will remain untouched.
system_info.clear_login_confirm: Clear local login data and sign out now?
